cause.description:
The UK group was set up in 2001 by Denise Townsend a super slimmer from Leicestershire, now she has a whole team holding monthly meetings and running a website to help obese people around the globe
1. GP's must take obesity seriously
2. Hospital's should have more facilities for the obese
3. Education of diet and exercise is the key to fighting obesity
cause.name: H.O.P.E. Help Obese People Everywhere
